meanings.definition: To play a trump card in a game of cards.
meanings.sent1: During the game, she surprised everyone by ruffing at the last moment.
meanings.sent2: He always wins by ruffing when he's losing.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved ruffing the ace from his sleeve.
meanings.sent4: In the final round, she ruffed her way to victory.
meanings.sent5: The player's strategy of ruffing at the right time paid off.

meanings.definition: The act of roughening or making uneven.
meanings.sent1: The ruffing of the surface made it difficult to walk on.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the ruffing of the ground made it hard to drive through.
meanings.sent3: The ruffing of the path caused many to stumble.
meanings.sent4: The ruffing of the fabric gave it a unique texture.
meanings.sent5: The ruffing of the edges added character to the artwork.

meanings.definition: A decorative collar or frill worn around the neck.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress with a ruffing that matched her earrings.
meanings.sent2: The costume designer added a delicate ruffing to the dress.
meanings.sent3: The clown's outfit had a colorful ruffing that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The queen's gown was adorned with an elegant ruffing.
meanings.sent5: The historical painting showed a nobleman with a lavish ruffing around his neck.
